title: How many chapters should be in a book? - Quora

response.answer_text: The number of chapters isn’t important, what is important is the word count. Some chapters can be as short as a page, some can be twenty or thirty pages. In fiction, 10,000 words is usually max for a short story. 20,000 is a novella, a novel is a MINUMUM of 50,000. A large percentage of fiction is between 60,000 and 130,000 words, depending on the genre. These are averages, some Stephen King books are 300,000 + words.
